Uses of Package
org.sonatype.restsimple.creator

Packages that use org.sonatype.restsimple.creator
org.sonatype.restsimple.creator   
 

Classes in org.sonatype.restsimple.creator used by org.sonatype.restsimple.creator
ServiceDefinitionBuilder
          Generate ServiceDefinition from a class.
ServiceDefinitionCreatorConfig
          A configuration object used by ServiceDefinitionBuilder when generating ServiceDefinition

The following table described how a class' methods are mapped to ServiceHandler and ServiceDefinition

Method starts with name Mapped to URI ============================================================================= create PostServiceHandler POST /create read GetServiceHandler GET /read/{anything} reads GetServiceHandler GET /reads update PutServiceHandler UPDATE /update delete DELETEServiceHandler DELETE /delete/{anything}
ServiceDefinitionCreatorConfig.METHOD
           
ServiceDefinitionCreatorConfig.MethodMapper
          A utility class used when translating a Class into a ServiceDefinition.
